name: 王甡
objective:
教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.
